actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, to prohibit certain franked mailings by Members of the Congress during certain periods before elections.

summary.text: Prohibits franked mass mailings by Members and Members-elect of the Congress during the 28-day period preceding any primary held with respect to any general or special election for any public office for which such Member is a candidate (regardless of whether the Member is a candidate in the primary), or during the period beginning 120 days before such election, whichever is longer (Amends 39 U.S.C. 3210 (a) (5) (D))

titles.title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, to prohibit certain franked mailings by Members of the Congress during certain periods before elections.
